DESCRIPTION: Manages the words you want to spy on, on your servers.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}spy add [Word]** ~ Adds this word to your list of words to be notified about when someone types it.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}spy remove [Word]** ~ Removes this word from your list of words.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}spy list** ~ Lists all the words available for you.
ALIASES: Spy does not have any aliases.
NONE: You do not have any words that you are spying on.
WORD_ADDED: **{{word}}** has been added to the spy records.
DONT_EXIST: **{{word}}** does not exist in your spy records.
ALREADY_SPYING: You already have **{{word}}** in your spy records.
WORD_REMOVED: **{{word}}** has been removed from your spy records.
